channel.title: dropwizard on snips
channel.description: Recent content in dropwizard on snips

item.title: Basic Dropwizard example
item.description: I’ve been trying out Dropwizard the last couple of months and it’s been very nice. There are many, many frameworks to choose from in Java country, so it comes as a relief to have a bunch of them chosen for me. Dropwizard glues Jersey, Jetty, Jackson and more together. The end result is a reduction in boiler plate code and complexity. Great for micro services. I am going to write a couple of posts about Dropwizard.
